title: Black Magic Spells Sound Pack
description: A collection of magical spells used in their practice by warlocks, sorcerers, dark priests, witches, fallen angels, magicians and spirits. The package contains 162 sound effects.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/black-magic-spells-sound-pack

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/70vf017il2lvcvg/MSE%20-%20Black%20Magic%20Spells%20Sound%20Pack_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


A collection of magical spells used in their practice by warlocks, sorcerers, dark priests, witches, fallen angels, magicians and priestesses.


The package includes 162 sound effects divided into 5 folders - "Black", "Energy", "Evil", "Mutation", "Spells":


  1. The "Black" folder contains 50 magical spells
  2. The "Energy" folder contains 10 magical spells
  3. The "Evil" folder contains 14 magical spells
  4. The "Mutation" folder contains 20 magical mutations
  5. The "Spells" folder contains 68 different black magical spells, such as acid, arcane, collapse, creature, defense, escape, flash, force, ghost, impact, power, squeal.


Use this asset to create magical spells for dark mages, warlocks, shamans, witches, evil wizards in your game scenes, or use these spells to produce sound for individual gameplay events.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 162 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 50 black spells
  • 10 energy spells
  • 14 evil spells
  • 20 black spells of mutation
  • 68 different black spells of 12 types
  • great for RPGs, strategies, casual games in the Fantasy, Dark Fantasy genre


Number of Audio Waves: 162

Number of Audio Cues: 162

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 07 minutes 11 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
